page.title: 11RECREATION-PASTIMES-cont.
page.content: The caller then calls out several letters in turn and if the players have that letter in their name they can move forward one step for each letter until they reach the caller, when they will become the caller in their turn. The boys enjoy chain tag where one boy chases the rest and when he has caught one, they link hands and chase together to catch a third and so on. If you see a pile of shoes in the middle of a circle then it will be a game of "Cat's got the Measles". Everyone says, "Cat's got the measles, Cat's got the flu, Chicken's got the chicken pox, And so have you." They all jump with legs apart and then legs crossed and if you finish with legs crossed you put a shoe in the middle but if you have legs apart, you can take a shoe out of the pile.
